Okay I have more questions. During campaign did the Samurai armies 
set up camps ? Did they have tents ? A bagage train ? and what were 
their rations like ? I have seen paintings of their Head quarters in 
the field but thats it. Their soldiers would have been in the open at 
night and exsposed to the weather with out some protection.I am 
building an impression and need to know this. During Living history 
displays I would like to set up some type of small camp. Thanks !!!

Takara
